Name: Pattern Recognition - IND
Text: Okay lets tackle this problem I need to construct the Python dictionary for the Log Skeleton based on the given scenario First lets understand what each part of the prompt says The Log Skeleton is a dictionary with keys equivalence always_before always_after never_together activ_freq directly_follows The values for these are specific sets or other dicts

Name: Hypothesis Generation - NE
Text: Equivalence If RO occurs then CA and RI must happen probably meaning they have the same occurrences

Name: Abductive Reasoning - NE
Text: Always Before If first activity is RO then CA must come before RI Or maybe the other way around Wait the constraint says If first occurs then second should be before

Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: activ_freq is a dict mapping each activity to allowed occurrence counts For example A {0 1} B {1 2} means A occurs either 0 or 1 time B occurs either 1 or 2 times

Name: Hypothesis Generation - NE
Text: assume that equivalence has a pair like RO and RI

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - NE
Text: directly_follows RO followed by RI so directly_follows should be RO RI

Name: Backtracking - NE
